title: Fresh herb vinaigrette
ingredients: ['125ml extra virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons white balsamic vinegar', '1 teaspoon Dijon mustard or wholegrain mustard', '1 pinch caster sugar', '1 tablespoon fresh thyme leaves, fresh tarragon, fresh chives or a combination', '1 garlic clove, crushed', 'salt and pepper']
